column12: Process for the manufacture of ceramic molds to be used for the preparation of unidirectional and single crystal metal components.
column13: In the manufacture of ceramic molds starting from aqueous suspensions, the combination of products already known in the field of ceramic molds (although not bound to the production of unidirectional and single crystal metal components), together with a particular coating sequence and with particular drying and sintering proceedings, allows one to considerably reduce the overall manufacturing time, in particular the drying time, as well as to improve the quality of the castings.
column15: POCCI DANTE;;BARNETT STEPHEN O

column12: PROCESSO PERFEZIONATO PER LA PRODUZIONE DI GUSCI CERAMICI PER COMPONENTI METALLICI MONOCRISTALLINI MONODIREZIONALI.
column13: Nella produzione di gusci ceramici da sospensioni acquose, la combinazione di prodotti già noti nel campo dei gusci ceramici (benché non destinati alla produzione di componenti metallici monocristallini o monodirezionali), assieme a una particolare sequenza di rivestimento e particolari procedure di essiccazione e di sinterizzazione, permette di ottenere significative riduzioni nel tempo globale di produzione, particolarmente nel tempo di essiccamento nonché di migliorare la qualità dei getti.

column12: Improved process for the production of ceramic shells for monocrystalline monodirectional metal components
column13: In the production of ceramic shells from aqueous suspensions the combination of products which are already known in the field of ceramic shells (but not intended for the production of microcrystalline or monodirectional metal components), together with a special coating sequence and special drying and sintering procedures, makes it possible to achieve significant reductions in overall production time, particularly in drying time, as well as improving the quality of castings.

column12: COMPACT SCORING INTERFACE
column13: A system and method are provided for the compact display of a large amount of customizable input data. A system displays a graphical interface including an overall score and a graphical representation of the overall score. A user may interact with the graphical interface to activate or deactivate one or more subscores that make up the overall score. A user may also interact with the graphical interface to modify how a subscore is calculated. In response to a subscore being activated or deactivated, or to a modification of how a subscore is calculated, the graphical interface updates to reflect the changes. By using the graphical interface, a user can quickly and easily condense data into a single overall score and can view how certain data is affecting the overall score in order to make evaluative decisions.

column12: Aparelho de dispensação para liberar gotículas de fluidos em filhotes de aves domésticas
column13: a presente invenção refere-se a um aparelho de dispensação (1) para liberar gotículas de fluidos, tais como líquidos com baixa viscosidade ou géis moles, para os filhotes de aves domésticas que estão presentes nas bandejas de filhotes montadas de maneira móvel (19) compreendendo pelo menos um reservatório (18), pelo menos uma unidade de bombeamento (9), conectada a pelo menos um reservatório (18), com pelo menos um coletor (8) conectado a pelo menos uma unidade de bombeamento (9), bem como a uma unidade de controle. o aparelho compreende uma pluralidade de atomizadores de fluido opcionalmente ajustáveis (6) conectados por meios de conexão flexíveis (7) a pelo menos um coletor (8), pelo que os atomizadores de fluido (6) são removíveis e/ou conectados de modo deslizante em pelo menos um trilho de montagem (5) e que opcionalmente diferentes tipos de atomizadores de fluido (6) são distribuídos no trilho de montagem (5). além disso, é descrito um método para liberar gotículas de fluido em filhotes de aves domésticas presentes nas bandejas de filhotes em movimento (19).
column15: PETRI DANIEL;;LORINI DANTE;;EVA MARIA BINDER;;LUCA STEFANO VANDI;;PFEFFER MARTIN;;STEPHEN CHARLES JOHN COLE

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DELIVERING DROPLETS OF FLUID ONTO POULTRY HATCHLINGS
column13: A dispensing apparatus ( 1 ) for delivering droplets of fluids such as liquids having a low viscosity or being soft gels onto poultry hatchlings that are present in movably mounted hatchling trays ( 19 ) comprising at least one reservoir ( 18 ), at least one pumping unit ( 9 ), connected to at least one reservoir ( 18 ), with at least one manifold ( 8 ) connected to at least one pumping unit ( 9 ), as well as a control unit. The apparatus comprises a plurality of optionally adjustable fluid atomizers ( 6 ) being connected by flexible connecting means ( 7 ) to at least one manifold ( 8 ), whereby the fluid atomizers ( 6 ) are detachably and/or slidably connected on at least one mounting rail ( 5 ), and that optionally different types of fluid atomizers ( 6 ) are distributed onto the mounting rail ( 5 ). Additionally, a method for delivering fluid droplets onto poultry hatchlings present in moving hatchling trays ( 19 ) is described.
column15: PETRI DANIEL;;VANDI LUCA STEFANO;;BINDER EVA MARIA;;PFEFFER MARTIN;;COLE STEPHEN CHARLES JOHN;;LORINI DANTE

column12: PROCESS FOR REDUCING THE COLOR OF AN EMULSION CONTAINING FUNCTIONALIZED POLYOLEFIN WAX
column13: Disclosed herein is a method for reducing the color of an emulsion of functionalized polyolefin wax by treating an emulsion with a water soluble oxidizing agent at a temperature above the freezing point and below the boiling point of the emulsion and below the softening point of the wax. Disclosed herein, also, is the essentially colorless emulsion produced according to the disclosed method which is useful as an additive to floor polishes and other coating products.
column15: RUNDQUIST PAUL ANDREW;;SMITH ERNEST PHILLIP;;POTEAT STEPHEN LOUIS;;RUTSTROM DANTE JOSEPH;;STUART RICHARD KINGSLEY JR

column12: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING HATCHLINGS WITH DROPLETS
column13: FIELD: agriculture.SUBSTANCE: group of inventions relates to agriculture, in particular to a dosing device for supplying drops of liquid, such as fluids having a low viscosity, or soft gels, to newly hatched poultry chicks, which are located in trays installed with the ability to move for newly hatched chicks and a method of delivering fluid droplets to newly hatched poultry chicks. The device contains at least one reservoir, at least one pumping unit, each of which is connected to at least one reservoir, at least one pipeline connected to at least one pumping unit, and at least, one control unit, as well as a plurality of liquid sprays, each of which is connected by flexible connecting means to at least one pipeline. In this case, the fluid nozzles are detachably and / or slidably connected to at least one mounting rail. The method involves preparing a fluid and placing it in at least one reservoir of a liquid metering device.EFFECT: group of inventions enables equal distributing active substance around the tray with baby birds that have just hatched.22 cl, 5 dwg
column15: PETRI DANIEL;;VANDI LUCA STEFANO;;BINDER EVA MARIA;;PFEFFER MARTIN;;COLE STEPHEN CHARLES JOHN;;LORINI DANTE

column12: Process for reducing the color of an emulsion containing functionalized polyolefin wax
column13: Disclosed herein is a method for reducing the color of an emulsion of functionalized polyolefin wax by treating an emulsion with a water soluble oxidizing agent at a temperature above the freezing point and below the boiling point of the emulsion and below the softening point of the wax. Disclosed herein, also, is the essentially colorless emulsion produced according to the disclosed method which is useful as an additive to floor polishes and other coating products.
column15: RUNDQUIST PAUL ANDREW;;SMITH ERNEST PHILLIP;;POTEAT STEPHEN LOUIS;;RUTSTROM DANTE JOSEPH;;STUART JR RICHARD KINGSLEY

column12: Aparato y método para suministrar gotitas de fluidos sobre polluelos de aves de corral
column13: Un aparato de dispensación (1) para suministrar gotitas de fluidos, tales como líquidos que tienen una baja viscosidad o geles blandos, sobre polluelos de aves de corral que están presentes en bandejas (19) de polluelos montadas de forma movible, el cual comprende al menos un depósito (18), al menos una unidad de bombeo (9), cada uno de ellos conectado al al menos un depósito (18), al menos un distribuidor (8), conectado a la al menos una unidad de bombeo (9), así como al menos una unidad de control (17), estando el aparato (1) caracterizado por que comprende, adicionalmente, una pluralidad de atomizadores de fluido (6), cada uno de los cuales está conectado, mediante medios de conexión flexibles (7), al al menos un distribuidor (8), de tal manera que los atomizadores de fluido (6) están unidos de forma desmontable y/o deslizante con al menos un raíl de montaje (5), y por que los atomizadores de fluido (6) se encuentran distribuidos sobre el raíl de montaje (5).
column15: PETRI DANIEL;;VANDI LUCA STEFANO;;BINDER EVA MARIA;;PFEFFER MARTIN;;COLE STEPHEN CHARLES JOHN;;LORINI DANTE

column12: NATURAL LANGUAGE INTERFACE CUSTOMIZATION
column13: A predefined interface is presented to a remote user. A natural language inquiry from the remote user is received via the predefined interface. The natural language inquiry is configured for use in an analysis. A customized interface is presented to the remote user based on the analysis of the natural language inquiry. The customized interface includes a customized set of communications options for the remote user to route communications.
column15: PINEDA GEORGE DANTE M;;HOWELL DAVID L;;PSZCZOLKOWSKI LAURA R;;FINDLEY DAVID;;DULANEY STEPHEN;;HICKS AMY;;JIA YONGMEI;;KRAUSS GEORGE W

column12: NATURAL LANGUAGE INTERFACE CUSTOMIZATION
column13: A method for communicating over a network includes transmitting, by an application server to a remote user computing device, a predefined interface in response to a contact request by the remote user, the predefined interface being customized by the application server based on specified conditions. The method also includes analyzing, by an analysis server in communication with the application server by a communication link different from the network, a natural language inquiry from the remote user based on the type of remote user language of the contact request. The method further includes transmitting, by the application server to the remote user computing device, a customized interface, which includes a customized plurality of communications options for the remote user to route subsequent communications, and customized content based on a context of the natural language inquiry.

column12: Natural language interface customization
column13: A predefined interface is presented to a remote user. A natural language inquiry from the remote user is received via the predefined interface. The natural language inquiry is configured for use in an analysis. A customized interface is presented to the remote user based on the analysis of the natural language inquiry. The customized interface includes a customized set of communications options for the remote user to route communications.

column12: Bispecific antibodies with cleavable C-terminal charge-paired tags
column13: The present invention is directed to a CH3-containing molecule comprising (a) a first polypeptide comprising a CH3 domain and a negatively charged domain comprising consecutive negatively charged amino acid residues; and (b) a second polypeptide comprising a CH3 domain and a positively charged domain comprising consecutive positively charged amino acid residues. Also provided are methods for conjugating synthetic molecules to a multi-specific antigen binding molecule.
